For basic printing functionality use the Postscript PPD. For advanced functionality such as printer status and maintenance features, use the HPLIP driver (which includes HPIJS).

Bring color in to your small- or medium-size business and watch your sales collateral, presentation materials, and everyday documents come alive. The HP Color LaserJet 3800 is the perfect "base" model to get you started; you can upgrade to more features as your business grows. Fast colour laser printer which does 16 pages/min in both color and grayscale. As the Epson AcuLaser C4000 it processes all four colours simultaneously.

Various flavors are available, with networking, extra trays, auto duplexer, etc.

Consumables/Refills: 1 print cartridge per color (Cyan, Magenta, Yellow, blacK)
